abstract: Costco chooses Citigroup and Visa to run its co-branded credit card starting in 2016, replacing American Express, which lost coveted deal in February.
lead_paragraph: The warehouse club Costco has chosen Citigroup and Visa to run its co-branded credit card starting next year, replacing American Express, which lost the coveted deal last month.

headline.main: Costco to Offer Citigroup and Visa Co-Branded Cards
headline.print_headline: Costco To Offer Citigroup and Visa Co-Branded Cards

snippet: The warehouse club Costco has chosen Citigroup and Visa to run its co-branded credit card starting next year, replacing American Express, which lost the coveted deal last month.
